Title: G'Day Melbourne
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Tamara P. Carter (teleplay by), Haley Harris (teleplay by), Damon Lindelof (story by)
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka
Plot: Kevin and Nora travel to Australia, where she continues to track down the masterminds of an elaborate con, while he catches a glimpse of an unexpected face from the past, forcing him to confront the traumatic events of three years earlier.
